headline: Corning (NYSE:GLW) Valuation Reassessed After Strong Momentum And Overvalued Fair Value Narrative
summary: Corning stock in focus after recent performance With no single headline event driving attention, Corning (GLW) is back on many watchlists after a strong run over the past year and is inviting a closer look at the fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Corning. Corning’s recent move to US$122.16 follows a sharp build in momentum, with a 38.83% 1 month share price return and a 135% 1 year total shareholder return that hint at shifting expectations for its long term prospects and risk...

headline: Corning (GLW) Jumps 18.3%, Hits All-Time High on Stellar Earnings, New Billion-Dollar Deal
summary: We recently published 10 Easy Double-Digit Gainers. Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) was one of the best performers last week. Corning grew its share prices by 18.3 percent week-on-week to hit a new all-time high, as investors cheered its stellar earnings performance and new billion-dollar partnership with Meta Platforms Inc. headline: Why a 175-Year-Old Glassmaker Is Suddenly an AI Superstar
summary: Everyone told the company to sell its unprofitable fiber-optic business. Now that division is powering its stock to all-time highs.
